path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Kino Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can change fees.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify fees, which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount and maximum wallet amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount and maximum wallet amount without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change fee wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee wallet.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw ERC tokens except native
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw ERC tokens excluding native tokens.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake ownership even after renouncing it.
